text:
ProxyCrawl startup | Node, Ruby, Network Engineer, Cloud-Computing, Support | 100% remote | Full-time only | Competitive salaries depending on role and experience (ranging $60k - $140k)

At ProxyCrawl we care about data, all our team loves the freedom that the internet gives to access anything at any time and that's what we want to share and provide to the world. Internet should be open and accessible for everyone.

Current job positions: - Remote network engineer - Remote cloud-computing infrastructure engineer - Remote senior backend engineer (ruby) - Remote senior software engineer (node)

Check full list here: https://proxycrawl.com/about-us#jobs

All our team is remote and from different countries and timezones.

Please email your resume to us at jobs [at] proxycrawl.com
